message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and unique features, I would like to extend this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $11,000. This is a special offer considering the value it brings to you.

Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I appreciate the discount, $11,000 is still a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm prepared to offer $10,500 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to consider your offer. In light of your proposal, I would like to counter with a price of $10,800 for the product. This is a more favorable offer than my initial proposal and I believe it provides a good balance between value and price. I look forward to your consideration.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $10,800 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with at this point.  I'm willing to go up to $10,600.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I've taken into account your latest proposal and am willing to accept $10,700 for the product. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise and I hope it works for you as well. Let's aim for a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, we're getting closer.  I'm happy to go up to $10,650.  This is a fair compromise and hopefully we can close the deal here.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $10,675 for the product. This is the highest I can go, given its value and the market conditions. I believe this offers a fair deal for both parties and I hope you'll find it acceptable.
